DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate usefulness pro-adrenomedullin ( precursor vasodilatory peptide involve septic shock pathogenesis ) copeptin ( stable peptide arginine vasopressin precursor ) predict , moment septic shock diagnosis change 6 hour , vasopressor requirement ( measure inotropic index vasopressor dependency ratio ) volume requirement resuscitation .
DOC.brief_title: Proadrenomedullin Copeptin Patients With Septic Shock
DOC.criteria: Patients ≥ 18 year Diagnosis septic shock Obtaining write informed consent . Initial dose norepinephrine ICU admission ≥ 0.6 mg / kg / min . Acute myocardial infarction previous month . History pituitary surgery . Pregnancy .
